mapper.select: select * from cold_hub where hubcode=#{hubcode} and hubname=#{hubname} and status=#{status} and mintemp=#{mintemp} and maxtemp=#{maxtemp} and minhum=#{minhum} and maxhum=#{maxhum} and remark=#{remark} and creator=#{creator} and createdt=#{createdt} and modifyby=#{modifyby} and modifydt=#{modifydt}
mapper.insert: insert cold_hub （ hubcode, hubname, status, mintemp, maxtemp, minhum, maxhum, remark, creator, createdt, modifyby, modifydt) values( #{hubcode}, #{hubname}, #{status}, #{mintemp}, #{maxtemp}, #{minhum}, #{maxhum}, #{remark}, #{creator}, #{createdt}, #{modifyby}, #{modifydt})
mapper.update: update cold_hub set hubcode=#{hubcode}, hubname=#{hubname}, status=#{status}, mintemp=#{mintemp}, maxtemp=#{maxtemp}, minhum=#{minhum}, maxhum=#{maxhum}, remark=#{remark}, creator=#{creator}, createdt=#{createdt}, modifyby=#{modifyby}, modifydt=#{modifydt} where rowid=#{rowid}
